author: Phil Vickery
method: Preheat the oven to 200C/400F/Gas 6. Place the flour, eggs, milk and sugar into a large bowl and mix together to make a smooth batter. Divide equal amounts of the raisins among the six muffin cases. Pour the batter into the cases and top each muffin with a peach half. Place the muffin cases into a muffin tin and bake in the oven for 8-10 minutes, or until golden-brown. To serve, place the muffins onto a plate and drizzle over the chocolate.
ingredients: 125g/4oz self-raising flour,  2 free-range eggs,  100ml/3½fl oz whole milk,  1 tbsp caster sugar,  50g/1½oz raisins,  6 tinned peach halves,  25g/1oz dark chocolate, melted, to serve
